description.text: You have just awakened in an unknown cave! I suppose it would be wise to find a way out...
These villages seem unknown, perhaps seeking answers would be wise
Reach the goblin camp and defeat Gomak

objective.text: Report about your victory to the mague

description.text: Cross the portal to reach your destiny, but be ready

quest.title: The four Keys of the apocalypse

description.text: You have found one of the four keys, I suppose the other three raided somewhere else, I wonder whereâ€¦
